title: Regulators to Enforce RestrictionsOn Web's New Cure: Colloidal Silver
author: Jill CarrollStaff Reporter
cleaned_text: June 14, 2001 12:01 am ET In this age of miracle medicines, here's one that sounds like a real doozy. It's a substance that can cure acne, herpes, cancer, leprosy and the bubonic plague -- "more than 650 different disease-causing viruses," its promoters say. Ads boast it gives the body "a superior second immune system." And it has Viagra-like power to spice up your sex life. Copyright ©2023 Dow Jones & Company, Inc.
